polynomial

Interface PolynomialNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PolynomialNodeElement, PolynomialNodeEmpty

    public interface PolynomialNode
    This class represents a node of a polynomial list. This is a recursive list structure that can store nodes containing polynomial terms. It allows the user to add terms to the list, count, take the derivative, get the maximum degree and coefficients of terms in the polynomial list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      This method specifies the coefficient given the power.

      This method returns the highest degree of the polynomial list as an integer.
      PolynomialNode removeNoCoefficient()
      Removes the terms that have a coefficient of 0.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Outputs the polynomials in the list as a string.

    • Method Detail

      • addTerm

        PolynomialNode addTerm(ComparePower comparator,
                       PolynomialTerm insert)
        This method will add a term to the list of polynomial nodes. It will add to the position such that the list will stay in decreasing order of it's power. Like terms will be combined.
        Parameters:
        comparator - A class with the method to compare the degree of two terms.
        insert - A new polynomial term.
        Returns:
        Returns a new node containing the polynomial that will be added to the list.

      • getDegree

        int getDegree()
        This method returns the highest degree of the polynomial list as an integer.
        Returns:
        Returns the degree as an integer.

      • getCoefficient

        int getCoefficient(int p)
        This method specifies the coefficient given the power.
        Parameters:
        p - Input the degree to get the coefficient of.
        Returns:
        Outputs the coefficient of the term with the degree.

      • evaluate

        java.lang.Double evaluate(EvaluatePolynomial e,
                          java.lang.Double d)
        Evaluates the terms using the given number.
        Parameters:
        e - A class with the evaluate function.
        d - The number as a double to evaluate with.
        Returns:
        Returns the results as a double.

      • derive

        PolynomialNode derive()
        Gets the derivative of this term.
        Returns:
        Returns a new node with the derivative.

      • count

        java.lang.Integer count()
        Counts the number of terms in the polynomial list.
        Returns:
        Returns the count as an integer.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Outputs the polynomials in the list as a string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Returns the polynomial as a list.

      • removeNoCoefficient

        PolynomialNode removeNoCoefficient()
        Removes the terms that have a coefficient of 0.
        Returns:
        Returns the nodes that do not have a coefficient of 0.
